title: Did 180-Day Countdown to UFO Disclosures Begin With COVID-19 Relief Bill?
subtitle: The Intelligence Authorization Act included in the same omnibus spending bill as COVID-19 relief called for an unclassified report on UFOs.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: In December 2020, a U.S. federal omnibus spending bill that included COVID-19 relief started a 180-day countdown to an unclassified report on UFO disclosures.
